description.EN: Use alternative raw materials like hemp and kenaf to produce paper. Save some trees and improve efficiency.
description.ES: Use alternative raw materials like hemp and kenaf to produce paper. Save some trees and improve the efficiency.
description.FR: Employez des matières premières alternatives comme le chanvre et le kénaf pour produire le papier. Économiser quelques arbres et améliorez l'efficacité.
description.DE: Use alternative raw materials like hemp and kenaf to produce paper. Save some trees and improve the efficiency.
description.IT: Use alternative raw materials like hemp and kenaf to produce paper. Save some trees and improve the efficiency.

description.EN: Based on the principle of litmus paper, produce special sheets of paper that can change color when immersed in different liquid solutions: your customers love the whimsy of it.
description.ES: Based on the principle of litmus paper, produce special sheets that change colors if they are immersed in different liquids. Your clients can have fun with them.
description.FR: Basé selon le principe du papier tournesol, produisez des feuilles spéciales de papier qui peuvent changer de couleur quand elles sont immergées dans différentes solutions liquides: vos clients adorent cela.
description.DE: Based on the principle of litmus paper, produce special sheets that change colors if they are immersed in different liquids. Your clients can have fun with them.
description.IT: Based on the principle of litmus paper, produce special sheets that change colors if they are immersed in different liquids. Your clients can have fun with them.

description.EN: Extraterrestrial wood can be slightly different from Earth's wood. Study those differences to improve the paper production.
description.ES: Extraterrestrial wood can be slightly different from the earth one. Study those differences to improve the paper production.
description.FR: Le bois extraterrestre peut être légèrement différent du bois de la terre.  Étudiez ces différences pour améliorer la production de papier.
description.DE: Extraterrestrial wood can be slightly different from the earth one. Study those differences to improve the paper production.
description.IT: Extraterrestrial wood can be slightly different from the earth one. Study those differences to improve the paper production.

description.EN: Produce specially designed hygienic containers for food storage: it appeals to the safety-conscious consumer.
description.ES: Produce special hygienic containers to store food. Safety is a major concern.
description.FR: Produisez des récipients hygiéniques spécifiquement conçus pour lentreposage de nourriture: cela répond au souci de sécurité des consommateurs.
description.DE: Produce special hygienic containers to store food. Safety is a major concern.
description.IT: Produce special hygienic containers to store food. Safety is a major concern.

description.EN: Hire artisans able to create beautiful handmade paper: for the most demanding customer. This paper is not cheap, but the quality of this product is dramatically enhanced.
description.ES: Hire artisans able to manufacture beautiful hand-made paper for demanding clients. They are not cheap, but the overall quality of your products greatly improves.
description.FR: Engagez des artisans qui soient capables de créer du beau papier á la main: ceci pour les clients les plus exigeants.  Cet article n'est pas bon marché, mais la qualité du produit est nettement augmentée.
description.DE: Hire artisans able to manufacture beautiful hand-made paper for demanding clients. They are not cheap, but the overall quality of your products greatly improves.
description.IT: Hire artisans able to manufacture beautiful hand-made paper for demanding clients. They are not cheap, but the overall quality of your products greatly improves.

name.FR: Nécessaire à papier pour le bricoleur

description.EN: Have your artisans prepare a special kit, to be sold in stores, for people who want to create their own paper: a new line of business.
description.ES: Have your paper artisans prepare a special kit to be sold in stores to people who wants to venture in creating their own paper. A new line of business.
description.FR: Demandez à vos artisans de préparer un nécessaire à papier spécial qui pourra être vendu dans les magasins aux personnes qui veulent créer leur propre papier: une nouvelle branche d'activité.
description.DE: Have your paper artisans prepare a special kit to be sold in stores to people who wants to venture in creating their own paper. A new line of business.
description.IT: Have your paper artisans prepare a special kit to be sold in stores to people who wants to venture in creating their own paper. A new line of business.

description.EN: Provide high quality paper to the mint to print banknotes: a very high profile contract.
description.ES: Provide high quality paper to the mint to print banknotes. Very high profile contract.
description.FR: Fournissez du papier de haute qualité à lHôtel de la Monnaie pour l'impression des billets de banque: un contrat très prestigieux.
description.DE: Provide high quality paper to the mint to print banknotes. Very high profile contract.
description.IT: Provide high quality paper to the mint to print banknotes. Very high profile contract.

description.EN: Produce cardboard boxes and other paper-based packaging: very in demand.
description.ES: Produce cardboard boxes and other paper based packaging devices. A very demanded line of products.
description.FR: Produisez des boîtes de carton et tout autre empaquetage en papier : des produits très demandés.
description.DE: Produce cardboard boxes and other paper based packaging devices. A very demanded line of products.
description.IT: Produce cardboard boxes and other paper based packaging devices. A very demanded line of products.

description.EN: Launch a massive campaign to promote the use of paper bags instead of plastic ones in stores. Increase the demand for your products, while coming across as environmentally friendly.
description.ES: Launch a massive campaign to promote the use of paper bag over plastic ones in grocery stores. Increase the demand and come across as environmentally friendly.
description.FR: Lancez une campagne massive pour favoriser l'utilisation des sacs en papier au lieu de ceux en plastique dans les magasins.  Augmentez ainsi la demande pour vos produits  tout en ayant lair de protéger  lenvironnement.
description.DE: Launch a massive campaign to promote the use of paper bag over plastic ones in grocery stores. Increase the demand and come across as environmentally friendly.
description.IT: Launch a massive campaign to promote the use of paper bag over plastic ones in grocery stores. Increase the demand and come across as environmentally friendly.

description.EN: Produce cheap but attractive attire, completely made out of high quality paper.
description.ES: Produce cheap but still good looking attires completely made out of high quality paper.
description.FR: Produisez des vêtements attrayants à un prix abordable, entièrement faits de papier de première qualité.
description.DE: Produce cheap but still good looking attires completely made out of high quality paper.
description.IT: Produce cheap but still good looking attires completely made out of high quality paper.

description.EN: Study how paper was made on early Earth; it will provide you with insights on how to improve the quality of your paper.
description.ES: Study how the paper was made in previous centuries on earth, it will give you insights on how to improve the quality of your factories paper.
description.FR: Étudiez comment au commencement des temps le papier a été fabriqué sur la terre; cela vous donnera des idées sur comment améliorer la qualité de votre papier.
description.DE: Study how the paper was made in previous centuries on earth, it will give you insights on how to improve the quality of your factories paper.
description.IT: Study how the paper was made in previous centuries on earth, it will give you insights on how to improve the quality of your factories paper.

description.EN: Basic skills to manage paper manufacturing.
description.ES: Basic skills to manage Paper factories.
description.FR: Techniques de base pour gérer les usines à papier.
description.DE: Basic skills to manage Paper factories.
description.IT: Basic skills to manage Paper factories.

description.EN: Everybody knows how nasty a paper cut be: create a line of knives with paper blades, ideal for cutting soft materials.
description.ES: Everybody knows how nasty a paper cut be. Create special knives with paper blades for cutting soft materials.
description.FR: Tout le monde sait combien mauvaise peut être une coupure faite avec du papier: créez une ligne de couteaux avec lames en papier, idéale pour couper les matériaux mous.
description.DE: Everybody knows how nasty a paper cut be. Create special knives with paper blades for cutting soft materials.
description.IT: Everybody knows how nasty a paper cut be. Create special knives with paper blades for cutting soft materials.

description.EN: Produce ancient style paper with modern equipment. Very nice to look at and perfect for diplomas or certificates.
description.ES: Produce ancient style paper with modern machinery. Very nice to look at and perfect for diplomas.
description.FR: Produisez du papier style antique avec l'équipement moderne. Très beau à regarder et parfait pour des diplômes ou des certificats.
description.DE: Produce ancient style paper with modern machinery. Very nice to look at and perfect for diplomas.
description.IT: Produce ancient style paper with modern machinery. Very nice to look at and perfect for diplomas.

description.EN: Build a recycling facility inside your plants so that you to use old paper towards making your new products: very cost-effective and environmentally friendly.
description.ES: Build a recycling facility inside your plants that allows you to use old paper for your new products. Very costly effective an environmentally friendly.
description.FR: Établissez un service de recyclage à l'intérieur de vos usines de sorte que vous employez le vieux papier dans la fabrication de vos nouveaux produits:  très rentable et écologique.
description.DE: Build a recycling facility inside your plants that allows you to use old paper for your new products. Very costly effective an environmentally friendly.
description.IT: Build a recycling facility inside your plants that allows you to use old paper for your new products. Very costly effective an environmentally friendly.

description.EN: Add a cleaning line to your product offering: paper towels and other paper-based cleaning products make for a very lucrative business.
description.ES: Adds tissues and other paper based cleaning products to your line of products. A very lucrative business.
description.FR: Ajoutez à vos produits une ligne de produits en papier pour nettoyage: les serviettes de papier et autres produits de nettoyage en papier génèrent des affaires très lucratives.
description.DE: Adds tissues and other paper based cleaning products to your line of products. A very lucrative business.
description.IT: Adds tissues and other paper based cleaning products to your line of products. A very lucrative business.
